scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FE,BE --prefix-colors green,yellow "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.version:changelog: npm run changelog:update && $(git var GIT_EDITOR) CHANGELOG.md && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.release: git switch master && git push && git switch release && git merge master --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch master
scripts.release:patch: git switch master && npm version patch && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: git switch master && npm version minor && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:major: git switch master && npm version major && git push && npm run release
